title: Journey through Britain
creator_credit: Frederic Goode, Terry Ashwood, BOAC and Associated British-Pathe
brief_description: A film tour of England, Scotland, Wales and Northern Ireland. A panorama of countryside, villages and castles is seen side-by-side with the modern amenities which these islands also offer. The film concludes with a section of the attractions of London.
creator_credit_for_label: Frederic Goode, Terry Ashwood, BOAC and Associated British-Pathe
